vendor.name: Equinix
vendor.summary: Equinix is the world's largest digital infrastructure company operating 260+ IBX data centers across 71 metros and 33 countries. Provides carrier-neutral colocation, interconnection services, and direct cloud on-ramps to major hyperscalers. Industry leader in sustainability and network density with 10,000+ networks and 2,000+ cloud/IT services accessible from Platform Equinix.

Strong focus on sustainability and serving hyperscale and enterprise customers.

services.name: Colocation

vendor.summary: Vantage Data Centers designs, builds, and operates carrier-neutral data centers across North America and Europe. Focuses on hyperscale and wholesale colocation with sustainable campus developments. Backed by Digital Bridge and known for rapid deployment capabilities.

vendor.name: NTT Global Data Centers
vendor.summary: NTT operates 160+ data centers worldwide across 20+ countries and regions. Part of NTT Ltd., provides carrier-neutral colocation, cloud, and managed services. Strong presence in Asia-Pacific with global Tier 1 IP backbone. Leading sustainability initiatives.

vendor.summary: Zayo provides fiber infrastructure, colocation, and bandwidth connectivity solutions. Operates 133,000+ route miles of fiber connecting 1,700+ data centers globally. vendor.name: Vultr
